entities.description: The number of recovered motor vehicles in a specified period.
The time frame when data on recovered motor vehicles was collected.
The unweighted frequency counts for each category of recovered motor vehicles.
Cases with missing data on the number of recovered motor vehicles.

relationships.description: Relates the survey to the period of data collection on recovered motor vehicles.
Denotes the unweighted frequency counts of recovered motor vehicles.
Indicates the presence of missing data in the recovered motor vehicles dataset.
